summary: This mod adds and NPC to Belethor\'s General Goods who sells Aetherium Shards, Aetherium Nuggets and Gems. This is to allow the player to store large amounts of gold in the form of the above items, so that they can sell all their loot in one stop.
descriptionHtml:
IMPORTANT NOTE WHEN USING THE TRADER: 56797 is the maximum amount of gold a merchant can have - if they go above this amount, they will continue purchasing your items but will NOT give you gold in return. In short, pay attention and don\'t let the merchant go above this amount or you will have to wait for them to reset.

This mod adds an NPC to Belethor\'s General Goods who sells Aetherium Shards, Aetherium Nuggets and Gems. This is to allow the player to store large amounts of gold in the form of the above items, so that they can sell all their loot in one stop. The aetherium items do not provide any gameplay advantage asides from serving as a high value gem. Aetherium shards and nuggets are not added to any loot tables.

The merchant\'s name is Oya, a former khajiit caravaner who stumbled into a sudden fortune, and now deals in enchanted items, gems and other rarities.

CHANGELOG

1.0 - Initial release

1.1 - Fixed Arcadia\'s door going missing
author: SkittleServal
